column4: can someone help me out pls? ive lost the ability to switch to terminals 1-6 when im in my display manager, which loads at boot.. so im unable to get to a console without display manager running :/
takes me back to the login
if i press it three times it kills the DM, but then i just have a black screen, the only time i can get to console is when the system is shutting down.. THEN ctrl+alt+f1-6 work
for the 4 sec it takes to shutdown
and because i cant login to root
i cant halt from the DM
maybe you can logon with 'linux single', then disable gdm with 'apt-get remove gdm'  ?
I haven't actually tried 'linux single' with Ubu, but it might work; otherwise perhaps a bootdisk could be made to work

i think ill try remove WDM complete removal from synaptic, which will then force me to shutdown using the power button >_< then hopefully ill dump into a terminal upon boot, whereas i can reinstall wdm and hopefully this retardness wont re-occur :/
yeah, that makes sense, if you can just remove *dm, then do that (you can re-install later)
